title: Cheesy Stuffed Pepper Casserole
directions: Brown ground beef in a large stock pot, drain, remove from pan and set aside. Heat oil in stock pot on medium high heat and add green peppers and onion. Saute 5-10 minutes or until softened, stirring occasionally. To stock pot, add tomatoes, sauce, corn, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes. Stir in rice and ground beef. Pour into a 9Ã—13 baking dish. Top with shredded cheese. Bake at 350 for 12-15 minutes or until cheese is melted.
